latest_articles.title: EU set to list Iran’s revolutionary guard corps as terrorist group
latest_articles.summary: “There can be no impunity for the crimes committed,” said French Foreign Minister Jean-Noël Barrot

latest_articles.title: EXCLUSIVE: Iranian reformists privately call on Khamenei to step down
latest_articles.summary: The effort to remove Ali Khamenei was halted by security threats, as Iranian media reported a suspected assassination attempt against one of the movement’s leading figures

latest_articles.title: Iran warns of ‘destructive consequences’ if EU lists Guards as terror group
latest_articles.summary: Italy's foreign minister said he would propose the idea "in coordination with other partners" when meeting his counterparts in Brussels later this week
